name: CADIO
0:
”Alexa, turn on LIGHTS”
”Alexa, turn off LIGHTS”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can use CADIO skill to control any Supported By CADIO smart home device.
You need to login with your CADIO Account which created in CADIO App.
After login, You will show all your devices listed and you can control any device by saying "Alexa, turn on DEVICE", "Alexa, turn off DEVICE".
